sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Download the latest zip file and extract the meta-description directory.
  2. Upload this directory inside your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate ‘Meta Description’ from the ‘Plugins’ tab on the Dashboard.

Is there a shortcode?

No. The meta description is inputted in a meta box from the “edit post” or “edit page” admin pages. It is inserted automatically when the plugin is activated.
